items.sentence: Tom doesn\'t have anyone to discuss his problems with.
Tom doesn\'t have to go back to Boston until tomorrow.
Could you tell me how to get to Park Street from here?
For some strange reason, Tom is wearing a dress today.
Have you already told Tom about what happened to Mary?
I beg your pardon, but would you repeat what you said?
I\'m not sure what time the concert is going to start.
I\'m pretty sure that Tom is hiding the truth from us.
I\'m really bad with names, but I never forget a face.
I was wondering if this might just be a waste of time.
